div.h2: Welcome to Eagle's Nest Academy. Start Early, Soar high.

div.h2: We Are Active Within Our Community
div.p: Eagle's Nest scholars join with other schools to pass out water to the community.

Educating K-6
Tuition-Free
Charter School
Private School Setting
Free Meals and Transportation for All Students

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-a677015 elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-18ea46a elementor-view-default elementor-position-top elementor-vertical-align-top elementor-widget elementor-widget-icon-box

div.p: We put great value and emphasis on character development at Eagle's Nest. We undestand that helping shape our students' character now, will contribute to their prosperity in the future.

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-19cb3e9 elementor-view-default elementor-position-top elementor-vertical-align-top elementor-widget elementor-widget-icon-box

div.p: We are dedicated to equipping your child with superior knowledge, and the skill to apply it, preparing our students for a bright and prosperous future.

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-8f6172e elementor-view-default elementor-position-top elementor-vertical-align-top elementor-widget elementor-widget-icon-box

div.p: We believe it is beneficial to begin equipping our children with economic literacy in order to promote their success in the multitude of economic decisions they will face in their future.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-8940c3f elementor-section-full_width elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-inner-section

div.p: We promote a healthy learning environment for our students that encourages an interactive learning experience. We believe that a hands-on approach to learning supports, and solidifies concepts.
We believe in the empowerment that comes from the knowledge of our history and culture, which is why we promote the Nguzo Saba principles at Eagle’s Nest.

We are a team of highly trained teachers and support staff who stand ready to provide your child with a superior education that will prepare them for college and lead to gainful careers utilizing 21st Century STEM technology and curriculum.
